If you're seeing this, then, PTZ Extension got an error when trying to access the camera. This probably means that the Extension doesn't have permission to the camera.

Fix this by:
  • Clicking on the Extension icon (the puzzle piece in the top right
  • Clicking "Manage Extensions"
  • Click the "Details" box under "PTZ Extension"
  • Click "Site settings"
  • Change the drop down for Camera to "Allow"
